ygData.messageBody:
At 07:00 AM 7/13/99 -0400, you wrote:

>halflings seem like a racethat is in touch with nature, , to be honest they
>just don't strike me as a race that would want to have bards. they seem more
>like a race that is in touch with their surroundings ( nature , animals) than
>they are with music and keeping history.

I beg to differ, but I almost decided *not* to play a Bard when I found out
I couldn't be a Halfling. This has been my biggest rant since day 1! I'm
incredibly disappointed that NO little people or evil race can be a Bard.
This should be fixed!!! Please? *grins*
When I asked about it, all I was told is that there were no CURRENT plans
to change class/race limitations.

Talies the Wanderer
aka Talies Wanderbur, Journeyman Bard of Elanthia
Member Troupe of the Four Winds
